${modID}:StepOn.NAME: Step On...
${modID}:StepOn.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL Gain !${modID}:SG! ${modID}:Speed or Gain !B! Block and lose !${modID}:SL! ${modID}:Speed.

${modID}:PopTheHood.NAME: Pop The Hood
${modID}:PopTheHood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vulnerable. Heal !${modID}:M2! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:NeutralGear.NAME: Neutral
${modID}:NeutralGear.DESCRIPTION: Reset your ${modID}:Gear. NL Reset any Dexterity changes caused by *Gear *Shift

${modID}:OilChange.NAME: Oil Change
${modID}:OilChange.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Draw a card. NL Heal !M! HP.
${modID}:OilChange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Heal !M! HP.

${modID}:MultiTrackDrifting.NAME: Multi Track Drifting
${modID}:MultiTrackDrifting.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Drift. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Tailgating.NAME: Tailgating
${modID}:Tailgating.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Rear *Bump into your hand.
${modID}:Tailgating.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Rear *Bump+ into your hand.

${modID}:RearBump.NAME: Rear Bump
${modID}:RearBump.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FORMulaOne.NAME: FORMula 1
${modID}:FORMulaOne.DESCRIPTION: Increase your ${modID}:Speed_Limit by !M!. NL Gain !${modID}:M2! % more ${modID}:Speed. NL If you ${modID}:Crash, die.

${modID}:LoudHonk.NAME: Loud Honk
${modID}:LoudHonk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:LoudHonk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
